sentences.en: " Do you call this a meadow or a pasture? "
sentences.cn: “ 你管这叫草场还是叫牧场? ”

sentences.en: Farmers traditionally used long - term rotations of hay, pasture, and corn.
sentences.cn: 农民以往 长期 实行干草 、 牧草和玉米轮作.

sentences.en: Horses are grazing in the pasture.
I'm retiring next month. They're putting me out to pasture.
sentences.cn: 我下个月退休。他们要我养老去了。

sentences.en: It is a good place for goats to pasture.
It was absolutely essential to separate crops from the areas that animals used as pasture.
sentences.cn: 将庄稼和放牧区分开绝对必要。

sentences.en: It's about time this old sewing machine was put out to pasture.
sentences.cn: 这部旧缝纫机大概到了被淘汰的时候了.

sentences.en: large areas of rough upland pasture
Pasture is the most important single crop in British agriculture.
sentences.cn: 在英国农业中,牧草是最重要的一种作物.

sentences.en: The boy got up very early every morning to pasture cattle.
sentences.cn: 这男孩每天起得很早去放牛.

sentences.en: The cows are out now, grazing in the pasture.
sentences.cn: 牛现在已经放出去了，正在牧场上吃草。

sentences.en: The farmer's land produced enough pasture to feed all of his livestock.
sentences.cn: 那个农民的土地上生产了足够他全部牲畜吃的牧草.

sentences.en: the lush pastures of the southern counties
There we saw herds of cows grazing on the pasture.
sentences.cn: 我们在那里看到一群群的牛在草地上吃草.

sentences.en: They were so old; they should have been put out to pasture years ago.
sentences.cn: 他们如此年迈, 多年前就该叫他们退休了.

sentences.en: This is the place where they used to pasture.
sentences.cn: 这就是他们过去经常放牧的地方.

phrases.tran_cn: 【非正式用语】 退休，离休：从工作或满工作量中退下或迫使退下

trans.tran_en: land or a field that is covered with grass and is used for cattle, sheep etc to feed on
land or a field that is covered with grass and is used for cattle, sheep etc to feed on
to put animals outside in a field to feed on the grass
to put animals outside in a field to feed on the grass
